attributes.action: grant Kevin Donnellon a life peerage to sit in the House of Lords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear PM,
I have a possible solution to making the House of Lords much more DEMOCRATIC.  Why not appoint some Lords based on the number of petitioners they get HERE?  It will be a form of an election and a boost to democracy!  Say 5,000 (votes) petitons [which is more than some House of Commons Members are elected with] and you graciously grant me a seat?  If succesful I promise to be a willing, honest, considerate, fair, hard working and energetic SERVANT to the people of the United Kingdom, so Help me God!
Yours truly,
Kevin Donnellon

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
